channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Lisa gets blinded by a whiteout sending her into danger; Dave attempts to retrieve his abandoned pipe load; Hugh and Rick head into the most remote terrain of Ontario.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Harsh winter weather leaves Lisa stranded in Prudhoe Bay; Dave tests Maya and Tony's patience; Rick's frustration reaches a boiling point and he snaps; Hugh rescue's Rick's truck.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Hugh and Rick face an obstacle that has the ice road blocked; Dave's has fuel tank trouble; Maya and Tony pick up abandoned loads; Lisa's monster load limps into town after losing two wheels.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Hugh and Rick run into Alex and decide to convoy north together; Alex surprises Hugh with a late Christmas present; Lisa and Tony haul record wide loads; Maya gets into trouble on Koyukuk's steep grades.
